name: Vladimir 2021
description:
Vladimir 2021 is a visual novel game. In it, you will immerse yourself in a short story of the protagonist, whose fate will be decided by your choice. The main gameplay is to make a choice after which the plot will advance each time. The ending of the game depends on your choice.

1. Interesting and "deep" music

2. Beautiful design of the game

3. Short but thought-provoking story

You will see and feel all this in the game Vladimir 2021!
